meeting_info.location: Dallas City Hall, 6FN Conference Room and Videoconference

agenda_items.title: Call to Order
agenda_items.description: Opening of the meeting by the Chair.

agenda_items.title: Special Recognition
agenda_items.description: Recognition of Barbara Sneary for her 27 years of service and Karl Hartford for his 23 years of service.

agenda_items.title: Approval of Minutes
agenda_items.description: Approval of the minutes from the meeting on August 15, 2024.

agenda_items.title: Reverchon Park Alcohol Permit
agenda_items.description: Authorize issuing an alcohol permit to Jodi Jordan for the Katy 5K event.

agenda_items.title: Reverchon Park Alcohol Permit
agenda_items.description: Authorize issuing an alcohol permit to Tanisha Maddox for the Leukemia & Lymphoma Society Light the Night event.

agenda_items.title: Norbuck Park Alcohol Permit
agenda_items.description: Authorize issuing an alcohol permit to Michael Baker for the Dallas Running Club Half Marathon event.

agenda_items.title: Flag Pole Hill Park Alcohol Permit
agenda_items.description: Authorize issuing an alcohol permit to Brad McCutcheon for the Dallas Oktoberfest event.

agenda_items.title: Flag Pole Hill Park Alcohol Permit
agenda_items.description: Authorize issuing an alcohol permit to Marcus Grunewald for the BMW of Dallas Fun Run.

agenda_items.title: Prism Center Alcohol Permit
agenda_items.description: Authorize an alcohol permit to 4Oak Events for the Night Market.

agenda_items.title: Public Hearing Authorization
agenda_items.description: Authorize a public hearing regarding the proposed use of parkland at Flag Pole Hill Park.

agenda_items.title: Cotton Bowl Renovation Agreement
agenda_items.description: Authorize Supplemental Agreement No. 2 for additional construction services for the Cotton Bowl Renovation.

agenda_items.title: Dallas Arboretum Pricing Model
agenda_items.description: Authorize a variable pricing model and a Credit Card Recovery Fee at the Dallas Arboretum.

agenda_items.title: Budget Development Update
agenda_items.description: Update on the budget development process.
